<div class="contents topic" id="contents">
<p class="topic-title first">Contents</p>
<ul class="simple">
<li><a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#examples" id="id1">Examples</a><ul>
<li><a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#a-python-script-which-generates-documentation" id="id2">A python script which generates documentation</a></li>
<li><a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#activate-the-logs" id="id3">activate the logs</a></li>
<li><a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#clone-a-git-repository" id="id4">Clone a git repository</a></li>

<li><a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#open-a-add-a-form-in-a-notebook-to-ask-parameters-to-a-user" id="id13">open a add a form in a notebook to ask parameters to a user</a></li>
<li><a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#open-a-tkinter-window-to-ask-parameters-to-a-user" id="id14">open a tkinter window to ask parameters to a user</a></li>

<li><a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#open-a-window-to-run-a-function-from-a-predefined-list-of-functions" id="id16">open a window to run a function from a predefined list of functions</a></li>

</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="section" id="a-python-script-which-generates-documentation">
<span id="lm-apythonscriptwhichgeneratesdocumentation"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id2">A python script which generates documentation</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#a-python-script-which-generates-documentation" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following code prints the version of Python
on the standard output. It it added to the documentation:</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre>.. runpython::
    :showcode:

    import sys
    print("sys.version_info=",str(sys.version_info))
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>If give the following results:</p>
<p>In</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre>    <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">sys</span>
    <span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"sys.version_info="</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sys</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">version_info</span><span class="p">))</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>Out</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre> <span class="n">sys</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">version_info</span><span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">sys</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">version_info</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">major</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">minor</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">micro</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">releaselevel</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">'final'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">serial</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">)</span>
 
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/helpgen/sphinx_run_script_extension.html#le-sphinx-run-script-extension-l109"><span>file sphinx_run_script_extension.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="activate-the-logs">
<span id="lm-activatethelogs"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id3">activate the logs</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#activate-the-logs" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">fLOG</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">OutputPrint</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/loghelper/flog.html#le-flog-l225"><span>file flog.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="clone-a-git-repository">
<span id="lm-cloneagitrepository"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id4">Clone a git repository</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#clone-a-git-repository" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">clone</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">r"local_folder"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"github.com"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"sdpython"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"pyquickhelper"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/loghelper/repositories/pygit_helper.html#le-pygit-helper-l475"><span>file pygit_helper.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="convert-a-notebook-into-multiple-formats">
<span id="lm-convertanotebookintomultipleformats"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id5">convert a notebook into multiple formats</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#convert-a-notebook-into-multiple-formats" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">process_notebooks</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"td1a_correction_session7.ipynb"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="s">"dest_folder"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="s">"dest_folder"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                  <span class="n">formats</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s">"ipynb"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"html"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"python"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"rst"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"slides"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"pdf"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"docx"</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/helpgen/process_notebooks.html#le-process-notebooks-l171"><span>file process_notebooks.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="convert-a-notebook-into-slides">
<span id="lm-convertanotebookintoslides"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id6">Convert a notebook into slides</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#convert-a-notebook-into-slides" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>By default, the function automatically adds sections if there is none
and it copies the javascript from reveal.js at the right place.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pyquickhelper</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">nb2slides</span>
<span class="n">nb2slides</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"nb.ipynb"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"convert.slides.html"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/helpgen/process_notebook_api.html#le-process-notebook-api-l117"><span>file process_notebook_api.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="create-a-pandas-dataframe-from-a-file-on-internet">
<span id="lm-createapandasdataframefromafileoninternet"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id7">create a pandas DataFrame from a file on internet</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#create-a-pandas-dataframe-from-a-file-on-internet" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">url</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">"http://www.xavierdupre.fr/enseignement/complements/marathon.txt"</span>
<span class="n">df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">read_url</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">url</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">sep</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"</span><span class="se">\t</span><span class="s">"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">names</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s">"ville"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"annee"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"temps"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s">"secondes"</span><span class="p">])</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/pandashelper/readh.html#le-readh-l35"><span>file readh.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="create-a-virtual-environment">
<span id="lm-createavirtualenvironment"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id8">Create a virtual environment</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#create-a-virtual-environment" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following example creates a virtual environment.
Packages can be added by specifying the parameter <em>package</em>.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pyquickhelper.pycode</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">create_virtual_env</span>
<span class="n">fold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">"my_env"</span>
<span class="k">if</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">exists</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fold</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mkdir</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fold</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">create_virtual_env</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fold</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/pycode/venv_helper.html#le-venv-helper-l155"><span>file venv_helper.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="file-autocompletion-in-ipython">
<span id="lm-fileautocompletioninipython"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id9">file autocompletion in IPython</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#file-autocompletion-in-ipython" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following code::</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pyquickhelper.ipythonhelper</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">AutoCompletionFile</span>
<span class="n">d</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">AutoCompletionFile</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"."</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>Will produce the following auto completion picture:</p>
<img alt="_images/completion.png" class="align-center" src="./html_example_files/completion.png">
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/ipythonhelper/kindofcompletion.html#le-kindofcompletion-l113"><span>file kindofcompletion.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="how-to-display-a-formula">
<span id="lm-howtodisplayaformula"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id10">How to display a formula</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#how-to-display-a-formula" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>We want to check this formula to successfully converted.</p>
<p><img src="./html_example_files/math-50a593ca1c.png"></p>
<p>Brackets and baskslash might be an issue.</p>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/helpgen/utils_sphinx_doc_helpers.html#le-utils-sphinx-doc-helpers-l1085"><span>file utils_sphinx_doc_helpers.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="how-to-generate-auto-rss-server-py">
<span id="lm-howtogenerateauto-rss-serverpy"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id11">How to generate auto_rss_server.py</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#how-to-generate-auto-rss-server-py" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following code generates the script <em>auto_rss_local.py</em>
which runs a local server to read blog posts included
in the documentation (it uses module
<a class="reference external" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyrsslocal/helpsphinx/index.html">pyrsslocal</a>):</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pyquickhelper</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">write_module_scripts</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">__blog__</span>
<span class="n">write_module_scripts</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"."</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">blog_list</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">__blog__</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">command</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"blog"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/pycode/setup_helper.html#le-setup-helper-l485"><span>file setup_helper.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="how-to-merge-notebook">
<span id="lm-howtomergenotebook"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id12">How to merge notebook?</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#how-to-merge-notebook" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following code merges two notebooks into the first one
and stores the result unto a file.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pyquickhelper.ipythonhelper</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">read_nb</span>
<span class="n">nb1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">read_nb</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"&lt;file1&gt;"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">nb2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">read_nb</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"&lt;file2&gt;"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">nb1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge_notebook</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nb2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">nb1</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_json</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">outfile</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/ipythonhelper/notebook_runner.html#le-notebook-runner-l639"><span>file notebook_runner.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="open-a-add-a-form-in-a-notebook-to-ask-parameters-to-a-user">
<span id="lm-openaaddaforminanotebooktoaskparameterstoauser"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id13">open a add a form in a notebook to ask parameters to a user</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#open-a-add-a-form-in-a-notebook-to-ask-parameters-to-a-user" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<img alt="_images/form.png" class="align-center" src="./html_example_files/form.png">
<p>Cell 1::</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre>from pyquickhelper.ipythonhelper import open_html_form
params = { "module":, "version":"v..." }
open_html_form (params, title="try the password *", key_save="form1")
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>Cell 2::</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">form1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>We can execute a simple action after the button <em>Ok</em> is pressed. This second trick
comes from <a class="reference external" href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxtream/fluxtream-ipy/master/Communication%20between%20kernel%20and%20javascript%20in%20iPython%202.0.ipynb">this notebook</a>.
The code displays whatever comes from function <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">custom_action</span></code> in this case.
You should return <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">""</span></code> to display nothing.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">custom_action</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s">"combined"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s">"first_name"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s">" "</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s">"last_name"</span><span class="p">]</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">x</span>
<span class="n">params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="s">"first_name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s">""</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"last_name"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s">""</span> <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">open_html_form</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">params</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"enter your name"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">key_save</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"my_address"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">hook</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"custom_action(my_address)"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/ipythonhelper/html_forms.html#le-html-forms-l88"><span>file html_forms.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="open-a-tkinter-window-to-ask-parameters-to-a-user">
<span id="lm-openatkinterwindowtoaskparameterstoauser"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id14">open a tkinter window to ask parameters to a user</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#open-a-tkinter-window-to-ask-parameters-to-a-user" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">params</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="s">"user"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">environ</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s">"USERNAME"</span><span class="p">],</span>
           <span class="s">"password"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s">""</span> <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">newparams</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">open_window_params</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">params</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"try the password *"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">help_string</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">"unit test"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">key_save</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"my_key"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The program opens a window like the following one:</p>
<img alt="_images/open_params.png" class="align-center" src="./html_example_files/open_params.png">
<p>The parameters <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">key_save</span></code> can be ignored but if you use this function
with different parameters, they should all appear after a couple of runs.
That is because the function uses <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">key_save</span></code> ot unique the file uses
to store the values for the parameters used in previous execution.</p>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/funcwin/frame_params.html#le-frame-params-l383"><span>file frame_params.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="open-a-tkinter-windows-to-run-a-function">
<span id="lm-openatkinterwindowstorunafunction"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id15">open a tkinter windows to run a function</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#open-a-tkinter-windows-to-run-a-function" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">open_window_function</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">test_regular_expression</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The functions opens a window which looks like the following one:</p>
<img alt="_images/open_function.png" class="align-center" src="./html_example_files/open_function.png">
<p>The parameters <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">key_save</span></code> can be ignored but if you use this function
with different parameters, they should all appear after a couple of runs.
That is because the function uses <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">key_save</span></code> ot unique the file uses
to store the values for the parameters used in previous execution.</p>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/funcwin/frame_function.html#le-frame-function-l528"><span>file frame_function.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="open-a-window-to-run-a-function-from-a-predefined-list-of-functions">
<span id="lm-openawindowtorunafunctionfromapredefinedlistoffunctions"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id16">open a window to run a function from a predefined list of functions</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#open-a-window-to-run-a-function-from-a-predefined-list-of-functions" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">functions</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span>   <span class="s">"test_regular_expression"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">test_regular_expression</span><span class="p">,</span>
                <span class="s">"test_edit_distance"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">file_grep</span><span class="p">,</span>
                <span class="s">"file_head"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">file_head</span> <span class="p">}</span>
<span class="n">main_loop_functions</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">functions</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">"title: TestMakeWindow2"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<img alt="_images/open_functionl.png" class="align-center" src="./html_example_files/open_functionl.png">
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/funcwin/main_window.html#le-main-window-l200"><span>file main_window.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="produce-html-documentation-for-a-function-or-class">
<span id="lm-producehtmldocumentationforafunctionorclass"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id17">Produce HTML documentation for a function or class</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#produce-html-documentation-for-a-function-or-class" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following code can display the dosstring in HTML format
to display it in a notebook.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pyquickhelper</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">docstring2html</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">sklearn.linear_model</span>
<span class="n">docstring2html</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">sklearn</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">linear_model</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">LogisticRegression</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/helpgen/convert_doc_helper.html#le-convert-doc-helper-l126"><span>file convert_doc_helper.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="run-a-local-server-which-serves-the-documentation">
<span id="lm-runalocalserverwhichservesthedocumentation"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id18">run a local server which serves the documentation</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#run-a-local-server-which-serves-the-documentation" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following code will create a local server: <a class="reference external" href="http://localhost:8079/pyquickhelper/">http://localhost:8079/pyquickhelper/</a>.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">this_fold</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">dirname</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pyquickhelper</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">serverdoc</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">documentation_server</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">__file__</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">this_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">abspath</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="n">this_fold</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">".."</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">".."</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">".."</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"dist"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"html"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">run_doc_server</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="bp">None</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">mappings</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="s">"pyquickhelper"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">this_path</span> <span class="p">}</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The same server can serves more than one project.
More than one mappings can be sent.</p>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/serverdoc/documentation_server.html#le-documentation-server-l579"><span>file documentation_server.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="run-a-notebook-end-to-end">
<span id="lm-runanotebookendtoend"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id19">Run a notebook end to end</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#run-a-notebook-end-to-end" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pyquickhelper.ipythonhelper</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">run_notebook</span>
<span class="n">run_notebook</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"source.ipynb"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">working_dir</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"temp"</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="n">outfilename</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"modified.ipynb"</span><span class="p">,</span>
            <span class="n">additional_path</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span> <span class="s">"c:/temp/mymodule/src"</span> <span class="p">]</span> <span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/ipythonhelper/notebook_helper.html#le-notebook-helper-l147"><span>file notebook_helper.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="run-a-program-using-the-command-line">
<span id="lm-runaprogramusingthecommandline"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id20">run a program using the command line</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#run-a-program-using-the-command-line" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">out</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">err</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">run_cmd</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s">"python setup.py install"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">wait</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="bp">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/loghelper/flog.html#le-flog-l944"><span>file flog.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="run-help-generation">
<span id="lm-runhelpgeneration"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id21">run help generation</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#run-help-generation" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="c"># from the main folder which contains folder src</span>
<span class="n">generate_help_sphinx</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"pyquickhelper"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/helpgen/sphinx_main.html#le-sphinx-main-l237"><span>file sphinx_main.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="simple-configuration-file-for-sphinx">
<span id="lm-simpleconfigurationfileforsphinx"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id22">Simple configuration file for Sphinx</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#simple-configuration-file-for-sphinx" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>We assume a module is configurated using the same
structure as <a class="reference external" href="https://github.com/sdpython/pyquickhelper/">pyquickhelper</a>.
The file <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">conf.py</span></code> could just contain::</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="c"># -*- coding: utf-8 -*-</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">sys</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="nn">os</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="nn">datetime</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="nn">re</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">solar_theme</span>
<span class="kn">from</span> <span class="nn">pyquickhelper.helpgen.default_conf</span> <span class="kn">import</span> <span class="n">set_sphinx_variables</span>

<span class="n">sys</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">insert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">abspath</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">join</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">os</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">path</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">split</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">__file__</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">])))</span>
<span class="n">set_sphinx_variables</span><span class="p">(</span>   <span class="n">__file__</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="s">"pyquickhelper"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="s">"Xavier Dupré"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="mi">2014</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="s">"solar_theme"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="n">solar_theme</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">theme_path</span><span class="p">,</span>
                        <span class="nb">locals</span><span class="p">())</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p><em>setup.py</em> must contain a string such as <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">__version__</span> <span class="pre">=</span> <span class="pre">3.4</span></code>.
Close to the setup, there must be a file <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">version.txt</span></code>.
You overwrite a value by giving a variable another value after the fucntion is called.</p>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/helpgen/default_conf.html#le-default-conf-l86"><span>file default_conf.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="synchronize-two-folders">
<span id="lm-synchronizetwofolders"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id23">synchronize two folders</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#synchronize-two-folders" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following function synchronizes a folder with another one
on a USB drive or a network drive. To minimize the number of access
to the other location, it stores the status of the previous
synchronization in a file (<code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">status_copy.txt</span></code> in the below example).
Next time, the function goes through the directory and sub-directories
to synchronize and only propagates the modifications which happened
since the last modification.
The function <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">filter_copy</span></code> defines what file to synchronize or not.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">filter_copy</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">file</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="s">"_don_t_synchronize_"</span> <span class="ow">not</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="nb">file</span>

<span class="n">synchronize_folder</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="s">"c:/mydata"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                    <span class="s">"g:/mybackup"</span><span class="p">,</span>
                    <span class="n">hash_size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span>
                    <span class="n">filter_copy</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">filter_copy</span><span class="p">,</span>
                    <span class="n">file_date</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">"c:/status_copy.txt"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>The function is able to go through 90.000 files and 90 Gb
in 12 minutes (for an update).</p>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/filehelper/synchelper.html#le-synchelper-l200"><span>file synchelper.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="transfer-files-to-webste-through-ftp">
<span id="lm-transferfilestowebstethroughftp"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id24">Transfer files to webste through FTP</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#transfer-files-to-webste-through-ftp" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>Simple sketch to transfer a list of <code class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">files</span></code> to
a website through FTP:</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">ftp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">TransferFTP</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">'ftp.&lt;website&gt;'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alias</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">password</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fLOG</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">issues</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span> <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">done</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span> <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">notdone</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span> <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="k">for</span> <span class="nb">file</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">files</span> <span class="p">:</span>

    <span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">r</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">ftp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">transfer</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">file</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path</span><span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">if</span> <span class="n">r</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">done</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">file</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span>
        <span class="k">else</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">notdone</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span> <span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">file</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">path</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">except</span> <span class="ne">Exception</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">e</span> <span class="p">:</span>
        <span class="n">issues</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">file</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">e</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">try</span> <span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="n">ftp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">close</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="k">except</span> <span class="ne">Exception</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">e</span> <span class="p">:</span>
    <span class="k">print</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"unable to close FTP connection using ftp.close"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/filehelper/ftp_transfer.html#le-ftp-transfer-l55"><span>file ftp_transfer.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="transfer-updated-files-to-a-website">
<span id="lm-transferupdatedfilestoawebsite"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id25">Transfer updated files to a website</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#transfer-updated-files-to-a-website" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<p>The following code shows how to transfer the content of a folder to
website through FTP protocol.</p>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="n">ftn</span>  <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">FileTreeNode</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"c:/somefolder"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ftp</span>  <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">TransferFTP</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"ftp.website.fr"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"login"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"password"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">fLOG</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">print</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">fftp</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">FolderTransferFTP</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ftn</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ftp</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s">"status_file.txt"</span><span class="p">,</span>
        <span class="n">root_web</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s">"/www/htdocs/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx"</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">fftp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">start_transfering</span><span class="p">()</span>

<span class="n">ftp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">close</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/filehelper/ftp_transfer_files.html#le-ftp-transfer-files-l128"><span>file ftp_transfer_files.py</span></a></p>
</div>
<div class="section" id="visualize-the-difference-between-two-text-files-or-strings">
<span id="lm-visualizethedifferencebetweentwotextfilesorstrings"></span><h2><a class="toc-backref" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#id26">Visualize the difference between two text files or strings</a><a class="headerlink" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/all_example.html#visualize-the-difference-between-two-text-files-or-strings" title="Permalink to this headline">¶</a></h2>
<div class="highlight-python"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"file1.txt"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s">"r"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">encoding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"utf8"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">f</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">text1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"file2.txt"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s">"r"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">encoding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"utf8"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">f</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">text2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">read</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">pg</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">create_visual_diff_through_html</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">text1</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">text2</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="k">with</span> <span class="nb">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"page.html"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="s">"w"</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="n">encoding</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s">"utf8"</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="k">as</span> <span class="n">f</span> <span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">f</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">write</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pg</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="kn">import</span> <span class="nn">webbrowser</span>
<span class="n">webbrowser</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">open</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s">"page.html"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
<p>see <a class="reference internal" href="http://www.xavierdupre.fr/app/pyquickhelper/helpsphinx/pyquickhelper/filehelper/visual_sync.html#le-visual-sync-l203"><span>file visual_sync.py</span></a></p>
</div>
</div>


          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
